Game

Interface BoardView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameBoard

    public interface BoardView
    This is the BoardView. This will eventually be used to control the board.
    Since:
    23/10/2017
    Author:
    John Berg, James Shorthouse

    • Method Summary

      Calculates and returns the number of flips needed

      This method determines whether the game has ended or not

    • Method Detail

      • isEnd

        java.lang.Boolean isEnd()
        This method determines whether the game has ended or not
        Returns:
        true if ended, false otherwise

        Returns the size of the board

      • legalMoves

        java.util.Set<Position> legalMoves(Piece piece)
        Determines all the legal moves a piece can make
        Parameters:
        piece - the piece in question
        Returns:
        a Set of Positions where the Piece can move to

      • view

        Piece view(Position boardPosition)
        Shows a piece on request
        Parameters:
        boardPosition - the position on the board being queried
        Returns:
        a piece or null if no piece exists
